item.title: Creating a forest garden plan with a satellite background image
item.author: hello@growdigital.org (Jake Rayson)
item.description: Using a CAD plan, it’s easy to move trees around to try out different ideas.

item.title: Dead hedge

item.description: The benefits of a dead hedge, made from cut branches and foliage are:

item.title: How to plant & mulch a weedy windbreak
item.author: hello@growdigital.org (Jake Rayson)
item.description: We’ve planted Amelanchier canadensis, Elaeagnus umbellata, Berberis darwinii and Viburnum opulus in the northern double-width windbreak hedge of the Ornamental Forest Garden.
